name: Easy Blueberry Crackers Recipe
recipeIngredient: 2 Tablespoon raw sugar or equivalent sweetener (or more for sweeter)
a generous pinch of sea salt
a generous pinch of spice of choice (I used cinnamon)

recipeInstructions.text: Puree the blueberries into as smooth as possible. I had 3/4 cup blueberry puree, from a bit more than a cup of Blueberries.
recipeInstructions.name: Puree the blueberries into as smooth as possible. I had 3/4 cup blueberry puree, from a bit more than a cup of Blueberries.

recipeInstructions.text: Add Oat flour, sugar, salt, spice and whisk well for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add Oat flour, sugar, salt, spice and whisk well for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mixture over parchment lined baking sheet and spread into a thin layer using a spatula. A bit thicker on the sides to avoid burning.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the mixture over parchment lined baking sheet and spread into a thin layer using a spatula. A bit thicker on the sides to avoid burning.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 325 degrees F for 45 minutes to an hour until just about crisp.(It will continue to crisp up while cooling).
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 325 degrees F for 45 minutes to an hour until just about crisp.(It will continue to crisp up while cooling).

recipeInstructions.text: Turn around twice in between for even baking.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn around twice in between for even baking.

recipeInstructions.text: Use pizza cutter when still warm to make cuts.
recipeInstructions.name: Use pizza cutter when still warm to make cuts.

recipeInstructions.text: The central part might feel like fruit leather if the batter layer was thick. With a thin and even spread, they come out crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: The central part might feel like fruit leather if the batter layer was thick. With a thin and even spread, they come out crisp.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely, break into pieces and store in an airtight container.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool completely, break into pieces and store in an airtight container.

keywords: cracker recipe, easy recipe, fruit crackers
